argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lssbn.x | |- X = ( W |`s U ) |
| 2 |  | lssbn.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lssbn.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_bnnvc | |- ( W e. Ban -> W e. NrmVec ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_lssnvc | |- ( ( W e. NrmVec /\ U e. S ) -> X e. NrmVec ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> X e. NrmVec ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_resssca | |- ( U e. S -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` X ) ) |
| 10 | 7 | #P_bnsca | |- ( W e. Ban -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. CMetSp ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` W ) e. CMetSp ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` X ) = ( Scalar ` X ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_isbn | |- ( X e. Ban <-> ( X e. NrmVec /\ X e. CMetSp /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_3anan32 | |- ( ( X e. NrmVec /\ X e. CMetSp /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) <-> ( ( X e. NrmVec /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) /\ X e. CMetSp ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_bitri | |- ( X e. Ban <-> ( ( X e. NrmVec /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) /\ X e. CMetSp ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_baib | |- ( ( X e. NrmVec /\ ( Scalar ` X ) e. CMetSp ) -> ( X e. Ban <-> X e. CMetSp ) ) |
| 18 | 6, 12, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. Ban <-> X e. CMetSp ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_bncms | |- ( W e. Ban -> W e. CMetSp ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 21 | 20, 2 | #P_lssss | |- ( U e. S -> U C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 22 | 1, 20, 3 | #P_cmsss | |- ( ( W e. CMetSp /\ U C_ ( Base ` W ) ) -> ( X e. CMetSp <-> U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 21, 22 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. CMetSp <-> U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 24 | 18, 23 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( W e. Ban /\ U e. S ) -> ( X e. Ban <-> U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
